name: WINO TIPSY LUSH Social Alert Button Set - party favors, gift
description:
LUSH + TIPSY + WINO
SOCIAL ALERT BUTTON SET
Artist made buttons for common physical & psychological situations
.....................................

► Fantastic gag gift for your wine loving friend!
► Perfect birthday gift with a nice bottle of red or white!
► Order several for a wine tasting party, or dinner party, favor!

READY TO WEAR
► Three hand-pressed 1.25" pin back buttons (hi-resolution)
► Affixed to a Social Alert backing card (as shown in photo)
► Sealed in a crystal clear cello bag
► Color may vary on different monitors, but rest assured it looks awesome in person

▲ WANT TO ORDER A BUNCH OF BUTTONS FOR A PARTY? ▲
Social Alert Buttons make fabulous Party Favors. We can even mix & match, so everyone gets to take one home that they love. Send me a Convo message & I can set up a custom listing for you.

name: FRIDGE MAGNET SET Cocktails - Mojito, Mai Thai, Whiskey Sour, Bloody Mary, food drinks liquor gift
description:
FOOD + DRINK Magnet Sets

+ MOJITO
+ MAI THAI
+ WHISKEY SOUR
+ BLOODY MARY

Perfect host or hostess gift!
A fantastic little gift for the liquor lover or foodie friend.

All magnets are hand-pressed 1.25" rounds.
Magnets arrive attached to a professionally printed DRINK UP! backing card.

name: HANGOVER BUTTON Party Pack of Social Alert Buttons - party favors
description:
HUNGOVER (Party Pack)
SOCIAL ALERT BUTTONS
Artist made buttons for physical & psychological situations
....................................

The perfect Bachelorette Party, Bachelor Party, or Wedding Favor!

THE SCENARIO
► You had a fantastic Friday or Saturday night, dancing the night away?
► But the dawn of a new day has left you queasy & slow moving?
► Feel you need more than sunglasses to say it?

Then these HUNGOVER BUTTONS are for you & 12 of your closest friends!

Just because you look or feel lousy, doesn’t mean you can’t have a sense of humor about it!

THE FACTS
► 12 hand-pressed 1.25" pin back buttons (hi-resolution) 
► Each button is affixed to a Social Alert backing card
► Button Colors: puke yellow-green w/ dark navy blue text
► Color may vary on different monitors, but rest assured they looks awesome in person.
► Save $3.00 by buying buttons in bulk!
 
WANT TO ORDER A BUNCH OF BUTTONS FOR A PARTY???
If you’d like to purchase several buttons for your various ailments, or to hand them out to friends and loved-ones as gifts, message me!  I can make you a custom listing for exactly what you want!

SHIPPED in a USPS Small Flat Rate box within the USA.
......................................

name: BREAKING BAD Magnet Set -  jesse pinkman quote, heisenberg
description:
BREAKING BAD MAGNET SET
Jesse Pinkman quote - Limited Edition Set

- Keep one for yourself, and give one to a friend!
-Perfect host/hostess gift to bring to Breaking Bad viewing parties this summer!
- Need to buy in bulk for a party? Send me a note, I'm happy to make it  happen!

DETAILS
- Two hand-pressed 1.25" round magnets, affixed to non-descript chipboard backing card
- Sky blue w/ black text + Black w/ sky blue text
- Comes in a small glassine bag - gift ready!

name: ART PRINT: Pink Paint Chip Poem Wall Art 8.5x11 Pantone Print, clever minimalist color blocking
description:
PAINT CHIP POEM
The colors are a gradation of PINKS with the following original text:

Pink Eye
Pepto Bismol
Softcore
White Trash
Blind Date
Backlash

"Pink Eye/Pepto Bismol" is an 8.5 x11" archival ink jet print.
Printed on premium heavyweight matte paper with Epson Claria Hi-Definition ink.

 - Amuse your friends!
 - Amuse yourself!
 - Perfect to frame and hang in the bathroom, bedroom, or give as a holiday gift!

This is a small print run of a non-editioned print, signed by the artist on the back.

Check out the artist book the print originated from here: 
http://art-ncr.com/portfolio/color-language/untitled-stories

SHIPPING
Print come unframed, in a clear protective sleeve
Each print is carefully prepared for shipping in a priority flat rate envelope for US shipments. Please message me regarding International Shipping - we will make it work!

© 2003-2013 nicole c russell. all rights reserved.
Copyright is not transferable with sale.
